ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen the harm touch and it was about 300 points. He is an undead shadow knight isn t he? That would explain it. If you camped him lately and he doesn t
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen the harm touch and it was about 300
points. He is an undead shadow knight isn't he? That
would explain it. If you camped him lately and he
doesn't harm touch, did they change him?

Maybe I have gone insane.


--- omnibus@... wrote:
> From: <omnibus@...>
>
> yes, both are off the undead knight, someone said
> that he does harm touch,
> which isnt true, but on occasion he will get a pet
> summoned, which dies
> easy. i've been camping this room alot lately, and
> you need a mid 20's
> group i'd say, healer type is nice. make sure the
> room downstairs is also
> camped (bar room), or you will get all those spawns
> too (they attack
> through the floor). if you have to take care of
> both tower room and bar
> room, its hectic, but a mid 20 group can do it as
> long as there are 2
> healer types, druid and cleric is good, and a burner
> makes things go
> smoother.
>
> the mantle is dropped every time, the tunic is a
> very rare drop, i would
> say 1 in 10 is a fair ratio, and he the knight
> spawns every 1-1.5 hour i
> think, never really noticed.
>
> Omnibus LightStorm
> Level 27 Paladin, E'ci
